property.name: exists
property.result: true iff the component exists in the game graph

property.name: isoperational
property.result: true iff the component exists in the game graph and is operational

property.name: iswreck
property.result: true iff the component exists in the game graph and is wrecked

property.name: isconstruction
property.result: true iff the component exists in the game graph and is in construction state

property.name: issurfaceelement
property.result: true iff the component is a surface element

property.name: isclass.{$class}
property.result: true iff the component exists and is of the given class

property.name: isclass.<classname>
property.result: Shortcut for isclass.{class.<classname>}

property.name: isclass.{$list}
property.result: true iff the component exists and is of one of the classes in the list

property.name: isrealclass.{$class}
property.result: true iff the component exists and is really of the given class, regardless of current state

property.name: isrealclass.<classname>
property.result: Shortcut for isrealclass.{class.<classname>}

property.name: isrealclass.{$list}
property.result: true iff the component exists and is really of one of the classes in the list, regardless of current state

property.name: canbeattacked
property.result: true iff the component exists in the game graph, is not a wreck, and is either operational, is of real class station, or is a child of a station

property.name: extension
property.result: Source extension id

property.name: isextensionpersonal
property.result: true iff the source extension is personal

property.name: class
property.result: Component class

property.name: realclass
property.result: Real component class, regardless of current state

property.name: state
property.result: Component state

property.name: macro

property.result: Length (size in Z dimension, based on bounding box)

property.result: Height (size in Y dimension, based on bounding box)

property.result: Width (size in X dimension, based on bounding box)

property.result: Cover Owner faction

property.result: True Owner faction

property.result: true iff owned by player (true owner)

property.result: true iff ownerless (faction Ownerless)

property.result: Distance to $position relative to parent

property.name: distanceto.{$componentslot}
property.result: Distance to component and connection offset of $componentslot

property.name: distanceto.[$component, $position]
property.result: Distance to $position relative to other component (space)

property.result: Distance from this component's bounding box to other component's bounding box

property.result: Distance from this component's bounding box to $position relative to parent

property.name: bboxdistanceto.{$componentslot}

property.name: bboxdistanceto.[$component, $position]

property.name: bboxdistanceto.[$component, $position, $sizeobject]
property.result: Distance from this component's bounding box to bounding box of $sizeobject at $position relative to other component (space) ($sizeobject may be identical to $component)

property.name: gatedistance.{$component}
property.result: Number of gates to other component. Providing cluster leads to using a random sector. The gate distance is -1 if the other component is unreachable via a path through the galaxy.

property.name: gatedistance.{$component}.{$refobject}
property.result: Number of known gates to other component for reference object. Providing cluster leads to using a random sector

property.name: gatedistance.{$component}.{$blacklistgroup}.{$refobject}
property.result: Number of known gates to other component using sector travel blacklist for reference object, defaulting to specified group blacklist if object doesn't have one. Providing cluster leads to using a random sector. The gate distance is -1 if the other component is unreachable via a path through the galaxy.

property.name: isblacklisted.{$blacklisttype}.{$blacklistgroup}.{$refobject}
property.result: true if this component is included in specified blacklist for reference object, defaulting to specified group blacklist if object doesn't have one

property.name: isknown
property.result: true iff the component is known to the player

property.name: isrelationchangedisabled
property.result: true iff the component has been flagged to not change its relation to others

property.name: hasrelation.<relationrange>.{$component}
property.result: true iff the relation to owner of other component is in specified range

property.name: hasrelation.<relationrange>.{$faction}
property.result: true iff the relation to $faction is in specified range

property.name: relationto.{$component}
property.result: Relation to owner of other component

property.name: relationto.{$faction}
property.result: Relation to $faction

property.result: Change to tolerance value per attack

property.name: relationchange.attacktolerance.decay
property.result: Rate at which tolerance decays back to 0

property.name: relationchange.attacktolerance.delay
property.result: Delay until tolerance begins to decay back to 0

property.result: Change to relation boost value per attack against component

property.name: relationchange.attackboost.delay
property.result: Delay until relation boost begins to decay

property.name: relationchange.attackfaction.scan
property.result: Change to faction relation per detected illegal scan of a station

property.name: relationchange.attackfaction.hack
property.result: Change to faction relation per detected hack of a station

property.name: relationchange.killboost.absolute
property.result: Absolute relation boost value to be set on kill of component

property.result: Change to relation boost value per kill of component

property.name: relationchange.killboost.decay
property.result: Rate at which relation boost decays back to default (faction) relation

property.name: relationchange.killboost.delay
property.result: Delay until relation boost begins to decay

property.result: Change to faction relation per kill of component

property.name: relationchange.killfaction.bonus
property.result: Change to faction relation per kill of nearby enemy object

property.name: relationchange.policefaction.change
property.result: Change to police faction relation when player is reported for attack on object

property.result: Change to police faction relation when player is reported for illegal scanning of an object

property.name: relationchange.policefaction.hack
property.result: Change to police faction relation when player is reported for hacking an object

property.name: relationchange.policefaction.bounty

property.name: relationchange.repairboost.absolute

property.name: relationchange.repairfaction.change
property.result: Change to faction relation per repair of component (NYI)

property.name: mayattack.{$component}

property.name: ishostileto.{$faction}

property.result: default response name for specified signal

property.result: default raw response name for specified signal

property.result: true iff this component has at least one waypoint matching all tags (also checks child components, stopping when it reaches an Object)

property.name: exists
property.result: true iff trade exists

property.name: available
property.result: true iff trade exists and is available

property.name: buyer
property.result: The buyer container if defined

property.name: seller
property.result: The seller container if defined

property.name: owner
property.result: Owner container (seller or buyer)

property.name: isbuyoffer
property.result: true iff trade is a buy offer

property.name: isselloffer
property.result: true iff trade is a sell offer

property.name: isoffer
property.result: true iff trade is an offer

property.name: isorder
property.result: true iff trade is an order (deal)

property.name: ware
property.result: Trade ware

property.name: ispricelocked.{$container}
property.result: True iff the price of the trade ware is locked on the trade partner of the given container

property.name: amount
property.result: Trade amount

property.name: desiredamount
property.result: Trade desired amount (really wanted amount, which may exceed affordable amount)

property.name: offeramount
property.result: Trade amount plus all the reserved amounts

property.name: offeramount.{$object}
property.result: Trade amount plus the reserved amount for this object

property.name: minamount
property.result: Minimum trade amount

property.name: transferredamount
property.result: Amount of wares that has been transferred for this trade

property.name: destroyedamount
property.result: Amount of wares that has been destroyed for this trade

property.name: volume
property.result: Total volume of trade amount

property.name: offervolume
property.result: Trade volume plus all the reserved volumes

property.name: offervolume.{$object}
property.result: Trade volume plus the reserved volume for this object

property.name: minvolume
property.result: Total volume of minimum trade amount

property.name: price
property.result: Total price of trade amount

property.name: unitprice
property.result: Price for a single unit

property.name: minprice
property.result: Total price of minimum trade amount

property.name: relativeprice
property.result: Current price between min and max as a value from -1.0 to +1.0

property.name: quantityfactor
property.result: Current price/average price ratio

property.name: hasdynamicprice
property.result: True if the trade does not have a fixed price (such as when the player sets a price at a player-owned station)

property.name: stocklevel
property.result: Ratio trade amount / target amount ratio (target amount of seller or buyer - for selloffers/buyoffers respectively. (see container.cargo.{$ware}.target)

property.name: stocklevel.{$amount}
property.result: Ratio amount / target amount ratio (target amount of seller or buyer - for selloffers/buyoffers respectively. (see container.cargo.{$ware}.target)

property.name: bundle
property.result: true iff the trade is flagged for converting ammo/units into wares on transfer

property.name: unbundle
property.result: true iff the trade is flagged for converting a ware into ammo/units on transfer

property.name: ismission
property.result: true iff the trade was spawned using a mission cue

property.name: missioncue
property.result: mission cue used to spawn object

property.name: tradeoffer
property.result: source trade offer (for trade orders derived from a specific offer)

property.name: buyfree
property.result: true iff the trade is flagged so that the buyer does not actually spend any money (seller would still receive money, unless $trade.sellfree is also true)

property.name: buyfree.{$object}
property.result: true iff the trade will be free for this particular buyer-object (seller would still receive money, unless $trade.sellfree is also true)

property.name: sellfree
property.result: true iff the trade is flagged so that the seller does not actually receive any money (buyer would still have to spend money, unless $trade.buyfree is also true)

property.name: sellfree.{$object}
property.result: true iff this particular seller-object would not actually receive any money (buyer would still have to spend money, unless $trade.buyfree is also true)

property.name: iswareexchange
property.result: true iff the trade is used to facilitate ware exchange or crew exchange

property.name: isshiptoship
property.result: true iff both trade partners are ships with corresponding active/passive trade orders (only supported for ware/crew exchange trades)

property.name: iscrewexchange
property.result: true iff the trade is used to facilitate ship-to-ship crew exchange

property.name: isbuyerpassive
property.result: true iff the buyer of this ship-to-ship ware/crew exchange is flagged as being the passive party (stationary)

property.name: issellerpassive
property.result: true iff the seller of this ship-to-ship ware/crew exchange is flagged as being the passive party (stationary)

property.name: ispassive.{$container}
property.result: true iff the trade is used for ship-to-ship ware/crew exchange and the supplied container is the passive party (stationary)

property.name: exchangepartner.{$container}
property.result: The exchange partner for this trade deal. Used for trade orders to specify who is trading with whom when the trade deal only has buyer OR seller defined. Will return the 'other' container if $container is part of the trade.

property.name: restriction.factions
property.result: List of factions that are allowed to perform the trade (empty if unrestricted, modified by restriction.inverted)

property.name: restriction.inverted
property.result: true iff the faction restriction is inverted and the trade is available to everyone except the restriction.factions

property.name: cantradewith.{$container}
property.result: true iff the supplied container is allowed to be involved with this trade

property.name: hasscanner
property.result: Does the player's controllable have scanner software

property.name: scanlevel
property.result: The current scan level of the player's scanner

property.name: maxscanlevel
property.result: The maximum scan level of the player's scanner

property.name: longrange
property.result: true iff the player's scanner can perform a long-range scan

property.name: debug
property.result: true iff debug options are available

property.name: debugfilteractive.<debugfilter>
property.result: true iff the debug output filter is currently active

property.name: isscreenshotmode
property.result: true iff game is set to screenshotmode

property.name: screenshotmode
property.result: Current screenshot mode

property.name: isinfullscreenmenu
property.result: true if any fullscreen menu is shown, false otherwise

property.name: isvrversion
property.result: true iff the VR version of the game is running

property.name: isvrmode
property.result: true iff game is currently in VR mode (always false in non-VR version)

property.name: chardensity
property.result: Density of characters on platforms (between 0 and 1)

property.name: module
property.result: The currently played module name

property.name: speakpriority
property.result: Highest speak priority of all current speakers, if any, otherwise -1000

property.name: input.controller
property.result: true iff player is using the controller, false if using keyboard/mouse (this value can change!)

property.name: input.joystick
property.result: true iff player is using a joystick (this value can change!)

property.name: input.boosttoggle
property.result: true iff boost is set to toggle on and off instead of a key being required to be held

property.name: input.mousesteering
property.result: true iff player is playing in mousesteering-mode, false otherwise (this value can change!)

property.name: input.mousesteering.permanent
property.result: true iff player is playing in permanent mousesteering-mode, false otherwise (this value can change!)

property.name: input.directmousesteering
property.result: true iff player is playing in direct mousesteering-mode, false otherwise (this value can change!)

property.name: input.oculustouch
property.result: true iff player is playing with Oculus Touch controllers

property.name: input.vivecontroller
property.result: true iff player is playing with Vive controllers

property.name: input.vrcontroller
property.result: true iff player is using any VR controller

property.name: input.shootatcursor
property.result: true iff player is shooting at the mouse cursor instead of straight ahead

property.name: input.autoroll
property.result: true iff player's ship is automatically rolling to align with the ecliptic

property.name: input.adaptivemousesteering
property.result: true iff the primary mouse steering axis (yaw or roll) is chosen based on the player's ship's steering capabilities

property.name: input.adaptivesticksteering
property.result: true iff the primary stick steering axis (yaw or roll) is chosen based on the player's ship's steering capabilities

property.name: input.flight.throttle
property.result: the relative forward speed set by the player, value is between -1 and 1

property.name: input.flight.horizontal
property.result: the relative horizontal strafe speed set by the player, value is between -1 and 1

property.name: input.flight.vertical
property.result: the relative vertical strafe speed set by the player, value is between -1 and 1

property.name: input.flight.pitch
property.result: the relative pitch speed set by the player, value is between -1 and 1

property.name: input.flight.yaw
property.result: the relative yaw speed set by the player, value is between -1 and 1

property.name: input.flight.roll
property.result: the relative roll speed set by the player, value is between -1 and 1

property.name: input.flight.matchspeed
property.result: whether the playership is currently matching the speed of the target

property.name: input.firstperson.isrunning
property.result: whether the player is currently running

property.name: input.firstperson.isjumping
property.result: whether the player is currently jumping

property.name: input.firstperson.iscrouching
property.result: whether the player is currently crouching

property.name: input.isinverted.firstperson.joystick.yaw

property.name: input.isinverted.flight.joystick.roll
property.result: whether joystick or controller roll input is inverted in flight

property.result: whether mouse pitch input is inverted in flight

property.result: whether mouse yaw input is inverted in flight

property.result: whether mouse roll input is inverted in flight

property.name: input.ismapped.<inputfunction>

property.result: whether a keyboard button is bound to the provided INPUT_... action, state or range

property.name: input.ismapped.mouse.<inputfunction>
property.result: whether a mouse button is bound to the provided INPUT_... action, state or range

property.name: input.ismapped.controller.<inputfunction>
property.result: whether a controller/joystick button is bound to the provided INPUT_... action, state or range (considering any assigned non-VR controller/joystick)

property.name: camera.yaw
property.result: the yaw angle of the player camera

property.name: camera.pitch
property.result: the pitch angle of the player camera

property.name: camera.roll
property.result: the pitch angle of the player camera

property.name: camera.zoom
property.result: the zoom of the player camera

property.name: timewarp.active
property.result: true iff time warp (SETA) is currently enabled

property.name: timewarp.available
property.result: true iff time warp can be enabled (i.e. SETA is installed and all activation conditions are met)

property.name: timewarp.factor
property.result: Time warp factor (game time that passes during a real-time second, 1.0s if not in time warp)

property.name: autosave.active
property.result: true iff autosaves are enabled

property.name: autosave.available
property.result: true iff saving is currently possible

property.name: autosave.factor
property.result: user-configurable factor to define the autosave interval

property.name: flightassist
property.result: true iff flight assist is active, otherwise false

property.name: hasclothingmod
property.result: Whether the player has any clothing mod installed

property.name: hasclothingmod.{$ware}
property.result: Whether the player has a clothing mod based on the specified clothing mod ware installed

property.name: loadoutlevel
property.result: The global loadout level for player-owned objects.

property.name: isdockuiactive
property.result: Whether the player's docking UI is currently active

property.name: hasemergencyeject
property.result: Whether the has emergency eject capability

property.name: isemergencyejectactive
property.result: Whether the player's emergency eject capability is active (will be false true only if the player has the capability, and they have not disabled it, and it is switched on using set_emergency_eject_active)

property.name: shouldplayertaxiwaitforplayer
property.result: Whether the ship which the player previously controlled should wait when the player gets up

property.name: shouldplayershipswaitforplayer
property.result: Whether any non-subordinate player ships wait for the player when docked, in case no docked ship was previously player-controlled

property.name: isonline

property.name: icon
property.result: Returns the name of the player icon as it is called in the IconLibrary

property.name: [$x, $y, $z]
property.result: Position value with given coordinates of type length

property.result: 3D vector value with given coordinates of type length

property.name: {$textpage}.{$textid}
property.result: Converted text string from TextDB (For constant IDs, use the short notation {123,456} instead of readtext)

property.name: {$textpage}.{$textid}.test.{$fallbackstring}

keyword.name: userdata
keyword.description: Access to user data values in userdata.xml

property.name: <valuename>
property.result: User data value

keyword.name: userdatasigned
keyword.description: Access to user data values in userdata_signed.xml (unmodified games only, will fall back to using userdata.xml in a modified game)

property.name: <valuename>
property.result: User data value

keyword.name: gamestart
keyword.description: Access to gamestart state values (only available during a session that starts with a new gamestart, i.e. during script initialisation, not available after loading a savegame)

property.name: storystate.<story>
property.result: Story state value

property.name: <paramname>
property.result: Game parameter value

keyword.name: param
keyword.description: Access to script parameters in parameters.xml

property.name: <categoryname>.<paramname>
property.result: Script parameter

keyword.name: loop
keyword.description: Access to iteration data of the current traversal loop (the most inner <do_for_each> action that the current action is in)

property.name: list
property.result: List that is being traversed (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a list)

property.name: group
property.result: Group that is being traversed (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a group)

property.name: index
property.result: Current iteration index in list/group (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a list or group)

property.name: element
property.result: List/group element at current iteration index (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a list or group)

property.name: table
property.result: Table that is being traversed (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a table)

property.name: key
property.result: Current iteration table key (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a table)

property.name: value
property.result: Value assigned to the current iteration table key (only valid if <do_for_each> is used with a table)
